text:
This patch provides an additional function which sets the page device dictionary
of postcript printer - minimising calls to setpagedevice command which can cause
underlying initgraphics calls (which in turn creates blank pages on some printers).
creator: dev@cumiskey.com
dev@cumiskey.com
text:
Created attachment 19918
patch file

The patch file to provide the additional postscript functionality.

Adrian Cumiskey.

creator: dev@cumiskey.com
text:
Actually this patch should initially go into the FOP code base before being
later propagated to xmlgraphics.  Please ignore this post - sorry for any
confusion caused.

Adrian Cumiskey.
